articles.title: Roscosmos names Russian cosmonaut expected to fly to ISS aboard SpaceX Crew Dragon ship
articles.description: Sergey Korsakov is the top candidate to become the first cosmonaut to travel to the International Space Station aboard the Crew Dragon spacecraft, made by Elon Musk’s private company SpaceX, the Russian training center chief said. Read Full Article at RT.com
articles.content: Russia and the US are planning to perform “mixed flights” to orbit, Pavel Vlasov, the head of the Gagarin Cosmonaut Training Center, told Komsomolskaya Pravda radio on Sunday. “It means that a Roscos… [+1803 chars]

articles.title: Farmers seeding the future of food production with robotics
articles.description: Chris Horn: Satellites and drones are shaping the future of farming
articles.content: Last November, a jovial farmer called Nikolai introduced YouTubers to the future of farming. In heavily accented English, he proudly showed off androids and gadgets made by the (fictitious) Izhevsk D… [+4906 chars]

articles.author: John Pike
articles.title: China, Russia to jointly build lunar post
articles.description: China and Russia have agreed to join hands in building and running a robotic scientific outpost on the moon or in lunar orbit, according to the China National Space Administration.
